Method Detail

getValue

public <T extends JsonValue> T getValue(int index,
                                        JsonType type)
Gets the JsonValue at the given index if it has the given type and automatically casts it to the expected type.

Type Parameters:
T - The JsonValue type to be returned.
Parameters:
index - The index of the JsonValue in this array.
type - The JsonType to validate against. If the value at the given index does not have this type then null is returned.
Returns:
The expected JsonValue or null if the JsonValue at the given index has a different type.
Throws:
ClassCastException - The expected type and actual type do not match.

get

public <T> T get(int index,
                 T defaultValue)
Tries to get and cast the value at the given index to the expected type and if that fails the defaultValue is returned.

Type Parameters:
T - The type to automatically cast the value to.
Parameters:
index - The index of the JsonValue in this array.
defaultValue - The defaultValue to return if the value in the array does not have the expected type.
Returns:
The value at the given index.
